Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Michael's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Michael joined a community called the Alexandria Safe Zone . Michael is among the volunteers to help build the wall on one of the roads to deter the mega herd in the operation to lure it away from Alexandria. Michael is killed when the Wolves invade Alexandria and start ransacking houses and murdering residents. The next day, Michael's body is gathered by Tobin and Bruce and buried along with the other slain Alexandrians. His name is then added to the memorial wall by Betsy and two other women .
Death[]: Killed By Aaron (Indirectly Caused) Aaron leaves his backpack at Del Arno Foods, which causes the Wolves to locate and attack Alexandria. The Wolves As the Wolves make their way into Alexandria, Michael is one of the many residents to be killed.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Michael has killed: Possibly a few zombies
Trivia[]: While never credited, the actor confirmed that he was killed in "JSS" and his name was written on the wall in "Now". [1] Michael, along with Stacy , was filmed fleeing from the Wolves, but the scene did not make the final cut.
Name: Michael
